subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States used goals by Jermaine Jones and Clint Dempsey to take a 2-1 lead, but a stoppage-time goal by Silvestre Varela gave Portugal a 2-2 tie in Manaus, Brazil, on Sunday.
snippet: The United States used goals by Jermaine Jones and Clint Dempsey to take a 2-1 lead, but a stoppage-time goal by Silvestre Varela gave Portugal a 2-2 tie in Manaus, Brazil, on Sunday.
